H0.text: who sang the theme song from russia with love. Frank Sinatra

H1.text: who sang the theme song from russia with love. Dean Martin

H2.text: who sang the theme song from russia with love. Tony Bennett

H3.text: who sang the theme song from russia with love. Matt Monro

A4.text: Monro recorded the title song from the James Bond film From Russia with Love (1963).

A5.text: For the title song from the James Bond film From Russia with Love, Monro's vocals were heard on a radio during the film and over the final credits.
